forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early, then partly cloudy and windy for the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early, then partly cloudy and windy for the afternoon. High 52F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 3C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 37F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 35F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 54F. E winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
